abstract: New-York Historical Society marks reopening of its renovated building with exhibit of American narrative paintings from the 1830s through the late 1860s, featuring a restored Civil War panorama by artist Louis Lang as the centerpiece.
snippet: An exhibition to open at the New-York Historical Society on Nov. 11 delves into American taste in art during a crucial period from the 1830s through the 1860s.
lead_paragraph: An exhibition to open at the New-York Historical Society on Nov. 11 delves into American taste in art during a crucial period from the 1830s through the 1860s.
